data.title: Yale University Staff, 1955-Present
data.meta_site_name: Cowles Foundation for Research in Economics
data.text:
*Staff lists are taken from Cowles Foundation Research Reports and other lists

July 1, 1955 – June 30, 1956*

Director: James Tobin

Assistant Director: Harold W. Guthrie

Executive Committee: James Tobin (Chairman) ♦ Edgar S. Furniss (Provost) ♦ Alfred Cowles ♦ Kent T. Healy (Chairman, Economics) ♦ Tjalling C. Koopmans ♦ Jacob Marschak ♦ Harold W. Guthrie (Secretary)

Research Staff, Professors: Tjalling C. Koopmans ♦ Jacob Marschak (on leave from Center for Advanced Study in the Behavioral Sciences)

Research Staff, Associate Professor: Gerard Debreu

Research Staff, Instructor: Robert Summers

Research Associates: Lionel W. McKenzie (on leave from Duke University, from February 1) ♦ Alan S. Manne (on leave from RAND Corp., from April 1) ♦ Harry M. Markowitz (on leave from Rand Corp., Sep. 1 – Apr. 30)

Research Assistants: Ralph Bristol ♦ William McKinstry ♦ Richard Rosett ♦ Harold Watts

Research Consultants (June 1956): Theodore W. Anderson ♦ Kenneth J. Arrow ♦ Carl F. Christ ♦ Harold T. Davis ♦ Trygve Haavelmo ♦ Clifford G. Hildreth ♦ William C. Hood ♦ Hendrik S. Houthakker ♦ Leonid Hurwicz ♦ Lawrence R. Klein ♦ Harry Markowitz ♦ Herbert A. Simon

Guests: Eraldo Fossati ♦ Leslie Kish ♦ Hermod Skanland

*Taken from the Report of Research Activities, July 1, 1954 – June 30, 1956
